name: ALF40
headline: Discreet bass-enhancer
description: A compact, hidden bass-enhancer with an adjustable ported design—built to disappear into walls, ceilings, cabinetry, or joinery while adding weight and warmth to distributed audio.
story: The ALF40 is a passive bass-enhancer designed for spaces where visual quiet is essential. Its adjustable ported architecture lets it blend into the build—venting cleanly with minimal visual impact—while reinforcing low frequencies for a fuller, more composed listening experience in distributed systems.
finish: Concealed in wall / ceiling / cabinetry / joinery
applications: Distributed audio systems needing gentle bass support
Living rooms and open-plan spaces (with invisible speakers)
Hospitality suites and lounge areas
Retail and boutique environments
Cabinetry and joinery integrations
specs: Electrical connection Push button spring terminals

name: ALF80
headline: High performance discreet subwoofer
description: A discreet, passive subwoofer with adjustable porting—designed to integrate into walls, ceilings, cabinetry, or joinery while delivering deeper extension and higher output for music and media rooms.
story: The ALF80 is engineered for applications that need more authority without visible hardware. With an adjustable port tube and multiple port-location options, it can vent into the room cleanly while remaining concealed—adding impact, scale, and low-frequency reach that elevates both music and cinema experiences.
finish: Concealed in wall / ceiling / cabinetry / joinery
applications: Music and media rooms requiring deeper bass
High-quality distributed audio with invisible speakers
Luxury residential living spaces
Boutique hospitality suites and lounges
Cabinetry / kickboard / under-furniture installations
specs: Electrical connection Push button spring terminals
Port locations Side, front, or end-firing

name: ALF100CV
headline: High performance discreet subwoofer
description: A hidden 4th-order bandpass subwoofer engineered for deep, controlled low-frequency power—mechanically isolated to minimise vibration transfer into the building structure.
story: The ALF100CV is designed for demanding applications where deep bass and architectural discretion must coexist. Its fail-safe mounting system mechanically isolates the enclosure from surrounding construction to reduce vibration transfer, while configurable port orientation supports both front-firing and end-firing installations in cavity ceilings, walls, or cabinetry.
finish: Concealed in cavity wall / cavity ceiling / cabinetry
applications: High-end residential systems needing deep bass to 28Hz
Luxury hospitality and lounge spaces requiring impact without visible subs
Cabinetry, kickboard, and under-sofa placements
Installations on 400mm to 600mm stud/joist centres (115mm+ cavity depth)
Projects requiring reduced vibration transfer into building structure
specs: Electrical connection Push button spring terminals
Installation dimensions (including mounting hardware) 115mm x 330–520mm x 1100mm
Port locations Configurable as front-firing or end-firing

name: ALF100SM
headline: High performance discreet subwoofer
description: Amina’s powerful discreet passive subwoofer—built for media/cinema rooms and high-pressure stereo systems, delivering serious output with plaster-up-to integration.
story: The ALF100SM is designed for large-room performance where bass must be felt—but never seen. It mounts between studs or joists, replacing a section of plasterboard/drywall while requiring minimal cavity depth. A discrete slot port vents into the room and can be hidden within baseboards or architectural detailing for truly invisible low-frequency reinforcement.
applications: Media rooms and cinema rooms
High-pressure stereo systems in large rooms
Luxury residential installations needing strong LF output
Cavity wall / ceiling installations with limited depth
Systems pairing with Amina invisible loudspeakers
specs: Electrical connection Push button spring terminals
Port locations Front, 20mm from short edge

name: ALF50SM
headline: High performance discreet subwoofer
description: A compact discreet subwoofer designed for architectural integration—adding controlled low-frequency support where space and finish quality matter.
story: ALF50SM is built for projects that require discreet bass support with clean architectural integration. It is intended to pair seamlessly with Amina invisible loudspeakers, reinforcing low frequencies while keeping the visual language of the room intact.
applications: Residential spaces needing discreet bass reinforcement
Hospitality guestrooms and lounge
Distributed audio zones
Projects where minimal visual impact is required
specs: Refer to official ALF50SM datasheet for full specifications
